title: Guy Gardner
description:
By request from No one, but...

What could be more fun than this. A torrent featuring the premiere brain damaged super-hero of the DC Universe!

This torrent contains the entire run of Guy Gardner/Guy Gardner: Warrior from DC Comics with art by Joe Staton and eventually Mitch Byrd. In my opinion the Warrior storyline and Byrd&#039;s art made this series more than worth the price of admission.

This is an excellent part of history for both the Green Lantern books and The Justice League International/America era.

I have also included the four issue mini series
Guy Gardner: Reborn with art by Joe Staton.

Thanks to the scanners and the varied original sources from which I collected these files.

Please seed. Please enjoy.
